item.title: A Quick How-to on Labelling Bar Graphs in ggplot2
item.description: Table of Content Introduction Data Preparation with the {tidyverse} Data Visualization with {ggplot2} How to Calculate the Percentage Values How to Position the Percentage Labels Inside the Bars How to Color the Bars Using Different Colors Polish Your Plot Introduction A few days ago, I got a request on some code creating bar charts with individual colors and percentage labels with the {ggplot2} package.
